content: using g hook 4mm & 2 strands white chain 200 fo you can either tie a knot or add a bit of hot glue to the end & shape it into a point you may want to lace it up prior to knotting it may be hard to pull through the sts to lace up pull through 3rd st of row 18 last row of mask & any portion of the center back piece that will make the mask fit securely mine is on row 13 skip 1 st & 1 row pull strands through next p s i love seeing pictures of your finished projects it s really my favorite part of putting out a pattern so feel free to tag me if you are so inclined its natalie allen if tagging me in a fb group xoxoxoxox distributing reselling or rewriting of this pattern or its photos is prohibited this includes any video tutorials page 6 of 6
